Public Member Functions

virtual void log (LogLevel level, const std::string &text)

Detailed Description

Logger that writes all log entries to the console (via printf).

Member Function Documentation

virtual void BStdoutLogger::log (  LogLevel    level,
const std::string &    text
)  [virtual]
 

Add new log entry.

This method shouldn't be called directly (although it can); rather, add the logger to BLoggerManager's set of loggers, and BLoggerManager will call this.

Implements BLogger.
